m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- Monday, March 30, 2015  Sunday, March 22, 2015  Sunday, March 15, 2015  textArticle -------------------- Broader Perspective  Ideas from  Philosopher  , Economic Theorist,  Blockchain Scholar  ,  DIYbio Innovator  , and Startup Founder  Melanie Swan  regarding the hope and potentiality of our future  Monday, March 30, 2015  Blockchain Thinking: The Brain as a DAC (Decentralized Autonomous Corporation)  Blockchains are a new form of information technology that could have several important future applications. They could be an explosive operational venue for new kin
